words.id: Alif laam miim
words.en: Alif Laam Meem

translations.text: Alif-Laaam-Meeem

words.en: Do think||the people||that||they will be left||because||they say||We believe||and they||will not (be tested)||(will not) be tested

translations.text: Ahasiban naasu any yutrakooo any yaqoolooo aamannaa Wa-hum la yuftanoon

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||Kami telah menguji||orang-orang yang||dari||sebelum mereka||maka sungguh mengetahui||Allah||orang-orang yang||(mereka) benar||dan sungguh Dia mengetahui||orang-orang yang berdusta
words.en: And indeed||We tested||those who||(were) before them||(were) before them||And will surely make evident||Allah||those who||(are) truthful||and will surely make evident||the liars

translations.text: Wa-laqad fatannal lazeena min qablihim fala-ya'lamannal laahul lazeena sadaqoo Wa-la-ya'lamannal kaazibeen

words.id: atau/apakah||mengira||orang-orang yang||(mereka) mengerjakan||kejahatan||bahwa||mereka akan mendahului kami||amat buruk||apa||yang mereka putuskan
words.en: Or||think||those who||do||evil deeds||that||they can outrun Us||Evil is||what||they judge

translations.text: Am hasibal lazeena ya'maloonas sayyiaati any yasbiqoonaa; saaa'a maa yahkumoon

words.id: barangsiapa||adalah||mereka mengharapkan||pertemuan||Allah||maka sesungguhnya||waktu||Allah||pasti datang||dan Dia||Maha Mendengar||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: Whoever||[is]||hopes||(for the) meeting||(with) Allah||then indeed||(the) Term||(of) Allah||(is) surely coming||And He||(is) the All-Hearer||the All-Knower

translations.text: Man kaana yarjoo liqaaa allaahi fa-inna ajalal laahi laa`at; Wa-Huwass Sameeul 'Aleem

words.id: dan barangsiapa||berjihad/berjuang||maka sesungguhnya hanyalah||dia berjihad||untuk diri sendiri||sesungguhnya||Allah||benar-benar Maha Kaya||dari||semesta alam
words.en: And whoever||strives||then only||he strives||for himself||Indeed||Allah||(is) Free from need||of||the worlds

translations.text: Wa-man jaahada fainnamaa yujaahidu linafsih; innal laaha laghaniyyun anil 'aalameen

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||beriman||dan mereka beramal||kebajikan/saleh||sungguh akan Kami tutupi/hapus||dari mereka||kesalahan/dosa-dosa mereka||dan sungguh akan Kami beri balasan mereka||lebih baik||yang||adalah mereka||mereka kerjakan
words.en: And those who||believe||and do||righteous (deeds)||surely We will remove||from them||their evil deeds||and We will surely reward them||(the) best||(of) what||they used||(to) do

translations.text: Wallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati lanukaf-firanna 'anhum saiyiaatihim Wa-lanajziyannahum ahsanal lazee kaanoo ya'maloon

translations.text: Wa-wassainal insaana biwaalidaihi husnanw Wa-in jaahadaaka litushrika bee maa laisa laka bihee ilmun falaa tuti'humaa; ilaiya marji'ukum fa-unabbi'ukum bimaa kuntum ta'maloon

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||beriman||dan mereka beramal||kebajikan/saleh||sungguh akan Kami masukkan mereka||kedalam||orang-orang yang saleh
words.en: And those who||believe||and do||righteous deeds||We will surely admit them||among||the righteous

translations.text: Wallazeena aamanoo wa'amilus saalihaati lanudkhilan-nahum fis saaliheen

translations.text: Wa-minan naasi maien yaqoolu aamannaa billaahi faizaaa ooziya fil laahi ja'ala fitnatan naasi ka'azaabil laahi Wa-la'in jaaa'a nasrum mir Rabbika la-yaqoolunna innaa kunnaa ma'akum; awa-laisal laahu bi-a'lama bimaa fee sudooril 'aalameen

words.id: dan sungguh mengetahui||Allah||orang-orang yang||beriman||dan sungguh Dia mengetahui||orang-orang yang munafik
words.en: And will surely make evident||Allah||those who||believe||And (He) will surely make evident||the hypocrites

translations.text: Wa-la-ya'lamannal laahul lazeena aamanoo Wa-la-ya'lamannal munaafiqeen

words.id: dan berkata||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||kepada orang-orang yang||beriman||ikutilah||jalan kami||dan kami akan membawa/memikul||kesalahan/dosa-dosamu||dan tidak||mereka||dengan membawa/memikul||dari||kesalahan/dosa-dosa mereka||dari||sesuatu/sedikitpun||sesungguhnya mereka||benar-benar orang pendusta

translations.text: Wa-qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanut tabi'oo sabeelanaa walnahmil khataayaakum Wa-maa hum bihaamileena min khataa-yaahum min shai'in innahum lakaaziboon

words.id: dan sungguh mereka akan memikul||beban mereka||dan beban-beban||bersama/disamping||beban-beban mereka||dan sungguh mereka akan ditanya||pada hari||kiamat||dari/tentang apa||adalah mereka||mereka ada-adakan

translations.text: Wa-la-yahmilunna asqaa-lahum Wa-asqaalam ma'a asqaalihim Wa-la-yus'alunna Yawmal Qiyaamati 'ammaa kaanoo yaftaroon

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||Kami telah mengutus||Nuh||kepada||kaumnya||maka dia tinggal||pada/bersama mereka||seribu||tahun||kecuali (kurang)||lima puluh||tahun||lalu menimpa mereka||taufan||dan mereka||orang-orang yang zalim
words.en: And verily||We sent||Nuh||to||his people||and he remained||among them||a thousand||year(s)||save||fifty||year(s)||then seized them||the flood||while they||(were) wrongdoers

translations.text: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee falabisa feehim alfa sanatin illaa khamseena 'aaman fa-akhazahumut toofaanu Wa-hum zaalimoon

words.id: maka kami selamatkannya (Nuh)||dan penghuni (penumpang)||kapal/bahtera||dan Kami jadikannya||tanda-tanda (pelajaran)||bagi semesta alam (ummat manusia)

translations.text: Fa-anjainaahu Wa-as-haabas safeenati Wa-ja'alnaahaaa Aayatal lil'aalameen

words.id: dan Ibrahim||ketika||dia berkata||kepada kaumnya||sembahlah||Allah||dan bertakwalah kepada-Nya||demikian itu||lebih baik||bagi kalian||jika||kalian adalah||(kalian) mengetahui
words.en: And Ibrahim||when||he said||to his people||Worship||Allah||and fear Him||That||(is) better||for you||if||you||know

translations.text: Wa-ibraheema iz qaala liqawmihi' budul laaha wattaqoohu zaalikum khayrul lakum in kuntum ta'lamoon

words.id: sesungguhnya hanyalah||kamu sembah||dari||selain||Allah||berhala||dan kamu membuat||kedustaan||sesungguhnya||orang-orang yang||kamu sembah||dari||selain||Allah||tidak||mampu||bagi kalian||rezeki||maka carilah||disisi||Allah||rezeki||dan sembahlah Dia||dan bersyukurlah||kepada-Nya||kepada-Nya||kalian dikembalikan

translations.text: innamaa ta'budoona min doonil laahi awsaananw-wa takhluqoona ifkaa; innal lazeena ta'budoona min doonil laahi laa yamlikoona lakum rizqan fabtaghoo indal laahir rizqa wa'budoohu washkuroo lahooo ilaihi turja'oon

words.en: And if||you deny||then verily||denied||(the) nations||before you||before you||And not||(is) on||the Messenger||except||the conveyance||clear

translations.text: Wa-in tukazziboo faqad kazzaba umamum min qablikum Wa-maa' alar Rasooli illal balaaghul mubeen

words.id: ataukah tidak||mereka memperhatikan||bagaimana||memulai menciptakan||Allah||makhluk||kemudian||Dia mengulanginya||sesungguhnya||demikian itu||atas/bagi||Allah||mudah
words.en: Do not||they see||how||Allah originates||Allah originates||the creation||then||repeats it||Indeed||that||for||Allah||(is) easy

translations.text: Awa-lam yaraw kaifa yubdi'ul laahul khalqa summa yu'eeduh; inna zaalika 'alal laahi yaseer

words.id: katakanlah||berjalanlah||di||muka bumi||maka perhatikan||bagaimana||Dia memulai menciptakan||makhluk||kemudian||Allah||menjadikan||kejadian||yang lain||sesungguhnya||Allah||atas||segala||sesuatu||Maha Kuasa
words.en: Say||Travel||in||the earth||and see||how||He originated||the creation||Then||Allah||will produce||the creation||the last||Indeed||Allah||on||every||thing||(is) All-Powerful

translations.text: Qul seeroo fil ardi fanzuroo kaifa bada'al khalqa Summal laahu yunshi'-'un nash-atal Aakhirah; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

words.id: Dia mengazab||siapa||Dia kehendaki||dan Dia memberi rahmat||siapa||Dia kehendaki||dan kepadanya||kamu dikembalikan
words.en: He punishes||whom||He wills||and has mercy||(on) whom||He wills||and to Him||you will be returned

translations.text: Yu'azzibu many yashaaa'u Wa-yarhamu many yashaaa'; Wa-ilaihi tuqlaboon

translations.text: Wa-maaa antum bimu'jizeena fil ardi Wa-laa fis samaaa'i Wa-maa lakum min doonil laahi minw waliyyinw Wa-laa naseer

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||dengan/kepada ayat-ayat||Allah||dan pertemuan dengan-Nya||mereka itu||mereka putus asa||dari||rahmat-Ku||dan mereka itu||bagi mereka (mendapat)||azab||yang pedih

translations.text: Wallazeena kafaroo bi-Aayaatil laahi Wa-liqaaa'iheee ulaaa'ika ya'isoo mir rahmatee Wa-ulaaa'ika lahum 'azaabun aleem

translations.text: Famaa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee illaaa an qaaluq tuloohu aw harriqoohu fa-anjaahul laahu minan naar; inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil li-qawmien yu'minoon

translations.text: Wa-qaala innamat takhaz-tum min doonil laahi awsaanam mawaddata bainikum fil hayaatid dunyaa summa Yawmal Qiyaamati yakfuru ba'dukum biba'dinw Wa-yal'anu ba'dukum ba'danw Wa-ma'waakumun Naaru Wa-maa lakum min naasireen

words.en: And believed||[in] him||Lut||and he said||Indeed I (am)||emigrating||to||my Lord||Indeed He||[He] (is)||the All-Mighty||the All-Wise

translations.text: Fa-aamana lahoo Loot; Wa-qaala innee muhajirun ilaa Rabbee innahoo Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

translations.text: Wa-wahabnaa lahoo iss-haaqa Wa-Ya'Qooba Wa-ja'alnaa fee zurriyyatihin Nubuwwata wal-Kitaaba Wa-aatainaahu ajrahoo fid dunyaa Wa-innahoo fil aakhirati laminas saaliheen

words.en: And Lut||when||he said||to his people||Indeed you||commit||the immorality||not||has preceded you||with it||any||one||from||the worlds

translations.text: Wa-Lootan iz qaala liqawmiheee innakum la-ta`toonal faahishata maa sabaqakum bihaa min ahadin minal 'aalameen

words.id: apakah sesungguhnya kamu||sungguh kamu mendatangi||laki-laki||dan kamu memutus/memotong||jalan||dan kamu mendatangkan/mengerjakan||dalam||tempat pertemuan||kemungkaran||maka tidak||ada||jawaban||kaumnya||kecuali||bahwa||mereka mengatakan||datangkanlah kepada kami||dengan azab||Allah||jika||kamu adalah||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang benar
words.en: Indeed you||approach||the men||and you cut off||the road||and commit||in||your meetings||evil||And not||was||(the) answer||(of) his people||except||that||they said||Bring upon us||(the) punishment||(of) Allah||if||you are||of||the truthful

translations.text: A'innakum la-ta'toonar rijaala Wa-taqta'oonas sabeela Wa-ta'toona fee naadeekumul munkara famaa kaana jawaaba qawmiheee illaaa an qaalu' tinaaa bi'azaabil laahi in kunta minas saadiqeen

translations.text: Qaala Rabbin surnee 'alal qawmil mufsideen

words.id: dan tatkala||datang||utusan Kami||Ibrahim||dengan kabar gembira||mereka berkata||sesungguhnya kami||membinasakan||penduduk||ini||negeri||sesungguhnya||penduduknya||adalah mereka||orang-orang yang zalim
words.en: And when||came||Our messengers||(to) Ibrahim||with the glad tidings||they said||Indeed we||(are) going to destroy||(the) people||(of) this||town||Indeed||its people||are||wrongdoers

translations.text: Wa-lammaa jaaa'at Rusulunaaa ibraaheema bil-bushraa qaalooo innaa muhlikoo ahli haazihil qaryati inna ahlahaa kaanoo zaalimeen

words.en: He said||Indeed||in it||(is) Lut||They said||We||know better||who||(is) in it||We will surely save him||and his family||except||his wife||She||(is) of||those who remain behind

translations.text: Qaala inna feeha Lootaa; qaaloo nahnu a'lamu biman feehaa lanunajjjiyannahoo Wa-ahlahooo illam ra-atahoo kaanat minal ghaabireen

words.id: dan tatkala||bahwa||datang||utusan Kami||Lut||dia merasa susah||dengan mereka||dan dia sempit/sesak||dengan mereka||lengan/kekuatan||dan mereka berkata||jangan||kamu takut||dan jangan||kamu susah||sesungguhnya kami||menyelamatkan kamu||dan keluargamu/pengikutmu||kecuali||isterimu||adalah ia||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang tertinggal
words.en: And when||[that]||came||Our messengers||(to) Lut||he was distressed||for them||and felt straitened||for them||(and) uneasy||And they said||(Do) not||fear||and (do) not||grieve||Indeed we||(will) save you||and your family||except||your wife||She||(is) of||those who remain behind

translations.text: Wa-lammaaa an jaaa'at Rusulunaa Lootan seee'a bihim Wa-daaqa bihim zar'anw Wa-qaaloo laa takhaf Wa-laa tahzan innaa munajjooka Wa-ahlaka illam ra-ataka kaanat minal ghaabireen

words.en: Indeed we||(will) bring down||on||(the) people||(of) this||town||a punishment||from||(the) sky||because||they have been||defiantly disobedient

translations.text: innaa munziloona 'alaaa ahli haazihil qaryati rijzan minas samaaa'i bimaa kaanoo yafsuqoon

words.id: dan sesungguhnya||Kami tinggalkan||dari padanya||suatu ayat/bukti||yang nyata||bagi kaum||mereka berakal
words.en: And verily||We have left||about it||a sign||(as) evidence||for a people||who use reason

translations.text: Wa-laqad taraknaa min-haaa aayatan baiyinatan liqawmien ya'qiloon

words.id: dan kepada||penduduk Madyan||saudara mereka||Syu'aib||maka dia berkata||wahai kaumku||sembahlah||Allah||dan harapkan||hari||akhir||dan jangan||kamu melakukan kejahatan||di||muka bumi||orang-orang yang berbuat kerusakan
words.en: And to||Madyan||their brother||Shuaib||And he said||O my people!||Worship||Allah||and expect||the Day||the Last||and (do) not||commit evil||in||the earth||(as) corrupters

translations.text: Wa-ilaa Madyana akhaahum Shu'ayban faqaala yaa-qawmi' budul laaha warjul yawmal aakhira Wa-laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen

words.en: But they denied him||so seized them||the earthquake||and they became||in||their home||fallen prone

translations.text: Fakazzaboohu fa-akhazat-humur rajfatu fa-asbahoo fee daarihim jaasimeen

words.id: dan (kaum) Ad||dan Tsamud||dan sungguh||telah nyata||bagi kalian||dari||tempat tinggal mereka||dan menjadikan memandang baik||bagi/kepada mereka||syaitan||perbuatan mereka||lalu ia menghalangi mereka||dari||jalan||dan adalah mereka||orang-orang yang berpandangan tajam

translations.text: Wa-'Aadanw Wa-Samooda Wa-qad tabaiyana lakum min masaakinihim Wa-zaiyana lahumush Shaitaanu a'maalahum fasaddahum anis sabeeli Wa-kaanoo mustabsireen

words.id: dan Karun||dan Fir'aun||dan Haman||dan sesungguhnya||telah datang kepada mereka||Musa||dengan keterangan yang nyata||maka/akan tetapi mereka berlaku sombong||di||muka bumi||dan tidaklah||mereka||orang-orang yang luput
words.en: And Qarun||and Firaun||and Haman||And certainly||came to them||Musa||with clear evidences||but they were arrogant||in||the earth||and not||they could||outstrip Us

translations.text: Wa-Qaaroona Wa-Fir'awna Wa-haamaana Wa-laqad jaaa'ahum Moosa bilbaiyinaati fastakbaroo fil ardi Wa-maa kaanoo saabiqeen

words.id: maka masing-masing||Kami ambil/siksa||karena dosa-dosanya||maka diantara mereka||orang||Kami kirimkan/timpakan||atasnya||hujan batu kerikil||dan diantara mereka||orang||menimpanya||suara keras/mengguntur||dan diantara mereka||orang||Kami benamkan||dengannya||bumi||dan diantara mereka||orang||Kami tenggelamkan||dan tidak||ada||Allah||untuk menganiaya mereka||akan tetapi||adalah mereka||diri mereka||mereka menganiaya
words.en: So each||We seized||for his sin||Then of them||(was he) who||We sent||on him||a violent storm||and of them||(was he) who||seized him||the awful cry||and of them||(was he) who||We caused to swallow||him||the earth||and of them||(was he) who||We drowned||And not||was||Allah||to wrong them||but||they were||themselves||doing wrong

translations.text: Fakullan akhaznaa bi-zanbihee faminhum man arsalnaa alaihi haasibaa; Wa-minhum man akhazat-hus saihatu Wa-minhum man khasafnaa bihil arda Wa-minhum man aghraqnaa; Wa-maa kaanal laahu li-yazlimahum Wa-laakin kaanoo anfusahum yazlimoon

words.id: perumpamaan||orang-orang yang||(mereka) mengambil||dari||selain||Allah||pelindung||seperti perumpamaan||laba-laba||ia mengambil/membuat||rumah||dan sesungguhnya||paling lemah||rumah-rumah||sungguh rumah||laba-laba||jika||adalah mereka||mereka mengetahui
words.en: (The) example||(of) those who||take||besides||besides||Allah||protectors||(is) like||the spider||who takes||a house||And indeed||the weakest||(of) houses||(is) surely (the) house||(of) the spider||if (only)||they||know

translations.text: Masalul lazeenat takhazoo min doonil laahi awliyaaa'a kamasalil 'ankaboot, ittakhazat baitaa; Wa-inna awhanal buyooti la-baitul 'ankaboot; law kaanoo ya'lamoon

words.id: sesungguhnya||Allah||mengetahui||apa||mereka seru/sembah||dari||selain Dia||dari||sesuatu||dan Dia||Maha Perkasa||Maha Bijaksana
words.en: Indeed||Allah||knows||what||they invoke||besides Him||besides Him||any||thing||And He||(is) the All-Mighty||the All-Wise

translations.text: innal laaha ya'lamu maa yad'oona min doonihee min shai'; Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

words.id: dan ini/itu||perumpamaan-perumpamaan||Kami membuatnya||untuk manusia||dan tidak||dapat memahaminya||kecuali||orang-orang yang berilmu
words.en: And these||examples||We set forth||to mankind||but not||will understand them||except||those of knowledge

translations.text: Wa-tilkal amsaalu nadribuhaa linnaasi Wa-maa ya'qiluhaaa illal aalimoon

words.id: menciptakan||Allah||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||dengan baik||sesungguhnya||pada||yang demikian||benar-benar tanda-tanda||bagi orang-orang yang beriman
words.en: Allah created||Allah created||the heavens||and the earth||in truth||Indeed||in||that||(is) surely a Sign||for the believers

translations.text: Khalaqal laahus samaawaati wal-arda bilhaqq; inna fee zaalika la-aayatan lil-mu'mineen

words.id: bacalah||apa||yang diwahyukan||kepadamu||dari||Al-Kitab||dan dirikanlah||sholat||sesungguhnya||sholat||mencegah||dari||perbuatan keji||dan mungkar||dan sungguh mengingat||Allah||lebih besar||dan Allah||Dia mengetahui||apa||kamu kerjakan
words.en: Recite||what||has been revealed||to you||of||the Book||and establish||the prayer||Indeed||the prayer||prevents||from||the immorality||and evil deeds||and surely (the) remembrance||(of) Allah||(is) greatest||And Allah||knows||what||you do

translations.text: Utlu maaa oohiya ilaika minal Kitaabi Wa-aqimis Salaata innas Salaata tanhaa anil fahshaaa'i wal-munkar; Wa-lazikrul laahi akbar; wal-laahu ya'lamu maa tasna'oon

words.id: dan janganlah||kamu berdebat||ahli||Kitab||melainkan||dengan yang||ia||lebih baik||kecuali||orang-orang yang||(mereka) zalim||diantara mereka||dan katakanlah||kami beriman||dengan yang||diturunkan||kepada kami||dan diturunkan||kepadamu||dan Tuhan kami||dan Tuhan kamu||satu/esa||dan kami||kepada-Nya||orang-orang yang berserah diri
words.en: And (do) not||argue||(with the) People of||the Book||except||by which||[it]||(is) best||except||those who||(do) wrong||among them||and say||We believe||in that (which)||has been revealed||to us||and was revealed||to you||And our God||and your God||(is) One||and we||to Him||submit

translations.text: Wa-laa tujaadilooo Ahlal Kitaabi illaa billatee hiya ahsanu illal lazeena zalamoo minhum Wa-qoolooo aamannaa billazeee unzila ilainaa Wa-unzila ilaikum Wa-illaahunna Wa-ilahukum waahidunw-wa nahnu lahoo muslimoon

words.id: dan demikianlah||Kami telah turunkan||kepadamu||Al Kitab||maka orang-orang yang||Kami berikan pada mereka||Al Kitab||mereka beriman||dengannya||dan dari||antara mereka||orang||ia beriman||dengannya||dan tidak||mengingkari/membantah||dengan ayat-ayat kami||kecuali||orang-orang kafir
words.en: And thus||We (have) revealed||to you||the Book||So those||We gave [them]||the Book||believe||therein||And among||these||(are some) who||believe||therein||And none||reject||Our Verses||except||the disbelievers

translations.text: Wa-kazaalika anzalnaaa ilaikal Kitaab; fallazeena aatainaahumul kitaaba yu'minoona bihee Wa-min haaa'ulaaa'i many yu'minu bih; Wa-maa yajhadu bi'Aayaatinaa illal kaafiroon

words.id: dan tidak||ada kamu||kamu membaca||dari||sebelumnya||dari||suatu Kitab||dan tidak||kamu menulisnya||dengan tangan kananmu||jika demikian||tentu ragu-ragulah||orang-orang yang membatalkan/mengingkari
words.en: And not||(did) you||recite||before it||before it||any||Book||and not||(did) you write it||with your right hand||in that case||surely (would) have doubted||the falsifiers

translations.text: Wa-maa kunta tatloo min qablihee min kitaabinw Wa-laa takhuttubhoo bi-yameenika izal lartaabal mubtiloon

words.id: bahkan/tetapi||ia (Al-Qur'an)||ayat-ayat||yang nyata||di dalam||dada||orang-orang yang||(mereka) diberi||ilmu||dan tidak||mengingkari/membantah||pada ayat-ayat Kami||kecuali||orang-orang yang zalim
words.en: Nay||it||(is) Verses||clear||in||(the) breasts||(of) those who||are given||the knowledge||And not||reject||Our Verses||except||the wrongdoers

translations.text: Bal huwa aayaatum baiyinaatun fee sudooril lazeena ootul ilm; Wa-maa yajhadu bi-aayaatinaa illaz zaalimoon

words.id: dan mereka berkata||mengapa tidak||diturunkan||atasnya/kepadanya||ayat-ayat (mukjizat)||dari||Tuhannya||katakanlah||sesungguhnya hanyalah||ayat-ayat (mukjizat)||di sisi||Allah||dan sesungguhnya hanyalah||aku||pemberi peringatan||yang nyata
words.en: And they say||Why not||are sent down||to him||(the) Signs||from||his Lord||Say||Only||the Signs||(are) with||Allah||and only||I (am)||a warner||clear

translations.text: Wa-qaaloo law-laaa unzila alaihi aayaatum mir Rabbihee qul innamal aayaatu indal laahi Wa-innamaaa ana nazeerum mubeen

words.id: ataukah tidak||cukup bagi mereka||bahwasanya Kami||Kami telah menurunkan||kepadamu||Al-Kitab||bacakan||atas mereka||sesungguhnya||dalam/demikian||itu||benar-benar rahmat||dan pelajaran||bagi kaum||mereka beriman
words.en: And is (it) not||sufficient for them||that We||revealed||to you||the Book||(which) is recited||to them||Indeed||in||that||surely is a mercy||and a reminder||for a people||who believe

translations.text: Awa-lam yakfihim annaaa anzalnaa alaikal kitaaba yutlaa alaihim; inna fee zaalika larahmatanw Wa-zikraa liqawmien yu'minoon

words.id: katakanlah||cukuplah||kepada Allah||diantara aku||dan diantara kamu||menjadi saksi||Dia mengetahui||apa||di||langit(jamak)||dan dibumi||dan orang-orang yang||beriman||kepada yang batil||dan mereka ingkar||kepada Allah||mereka itulah||mereka||orang-orang yang rugi
words.en: Say||Sufficient is||Allah||between me||and between you||(as) Witness||He knows||what||(is) in||the heavens||and the earth||And those who||believe||in [the] falsehood||and disbelieve||in Allah||those||they||(are) the losers

translations.text: Qul kafaa billaahi bainee Wa-bainakum shaheedaa; ya'lamu maa fis samaawaati wal-ard; wallazeena aamanoo bil-baatili Wa-kafaroo billaahi ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon

words.id: dan mereka minta disegerakan kepadamu||dengan azab||dan jika tidak||waktu||ditentukan||pasti datang kepada mereka||azab||dan sungguh akan datang kepada mereka||tiba-tiba||dan mereka||tidak||mereka menyadari
words.en: And they ask you to hasten||[with] the punishment||And if not||(for) a term||appointed||surely (would) have come to them||the punishment||But it will surely come to them||suddenly||while they||(do) not||perceive

translations.text: Wa-yasta'jiloonaka bil'azaab; Wa-law-laaa ajalum musammal lajaaa'ahumul a'zaab; Wa-la-ya'tiannahum baghta-tanw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon

words.id: mereka minta disegerakan kepadamu||dengan azab||dan sesungguhnya||jahanam||pasti meliputi||dengan orang-orang kafir
words.en: They ask you to hasten||the punishment||And indeed||Hell||will surely encompass||the disbelievers

translations.text: Yasta'jiloonaka bil'azaab; Wa-inna Jahannama la-muheetatum bil-kaafireen

words.id: pada hari||menutupi/meliputi mereka||azab||dari||atas mereka||dan dari||bawah||kaki mereka||dan (Allah) berkata||rasakanlah||apa||kalian adalah||kamu kerjakan
words.en: On (the) Day||will cover them||the punishment||from||above them||and from||below||their feet||and He will say||Taste||what||you used||(to) do

translations.text: Yawma yaghshaahumul 'azaabu min fawqihim Wa-min tahti arjulihim Wa-yaqoolu zooqoo maa kuntum ta'maloon

words.id: Hai hamba-Ku||orang-orang yang||beriman||sesungguhnya||bumi-Ku||luas||maka kepada-Ku||maka sembahlah Aku
words.en: O My servants||who||believe!||Indeed||My earth||(is) spacious||so only||worship Me

translations.text: Yaa-'ibaadiyal lazeena aamanooo inna ardee waasi-'atun fa-iyyaaya fa'budoon

words.id: tiap-tiap||yang berjiwa||merasakan||mati||kemudian||kepada kami||kalian dikembalikan
words.en: Every||soul||(will) taste||the death||Then||to Us||you will be returned

translations.text: Kullu nafsin zaaa'iqatul mawti summa ilainaa turja'oon

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||beriman||dan mereka beramal||kebajikan/saleh||sungguh Kami akan menempatkan mereka||dari/di dalam||surga||tempat yang tinggi||mengalir||dari||bawahnya||sungai-sungai||mereka kekal||di alamnya||senikmat/sebaik-baik||pahala/balasan||orang-orang yang beramal
words.en: And those who||believe||and do||[the] righteous deeds||surely We will give them a place||in||Paradise||lofty dwellings||flow||from||underneath it||the rivers||will abide forever||in it||Excellent is||(the) reward||(of) the workers

translations.text: Wallazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati la-nubawwi-'annahum minal Jannati ghurafan tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa; ni'ma ajrul aamileen

words.id: orang-orang yang||(mereka) bersabar||dan atas/kepada||Tuhan mereka||mereka bertawakkal
words.en: Those who||(are) patient||and upon||their Lord||put their trust

translations.text: Allazeena sabaroo Wa-'alaa Rabbihim yatawakkaloon

words.id: dan berapa banyak||dari||binatang||tidak||ia membawa/mengurus||rezekinya||Allah||memberi rezeki kepadanya||dan kepadamu||dan Dia||Maha Mendengar||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: And how many||of||a creature||(does) not||carry||its provision||Allah||provides (for) it||and (for) you||And He||(is) the All-Hearer||the All-Knower

translations.text: Wa-ka-ayyim min daaabbatil laa tahmilu rizqahaa; al-laahu yarzuquhaa Wa-iyyaakum; Wa-Huwas Samee'ul Aleem

words.id: dan jika||kamu bertanya kepada mereka||siapa||menciptakan||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||dan menundukkan||matahari||dan bulan||tentu mereka akan berkata||Allah||maka bagaimana||mereka dipalingkan
words.en: And if||you ask them||Who||created||the heavens||and the earth||and subjected||the sun||and the moon||Surely they would say||Allah||Then how||are they deluded

translations.text: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-sakhkharash shamsa wal-qamara la-yaqoolunnal laahu fa-anna yu'fakoon

words.id: Allah||melapangkan||rezeki||bagi siapa||Dia kehendaki||dari pada||hamba-hamba-Nya||dan Dia menyempitkan||baginya||sesungguhnya||Allah||dengan segala||sesuatu||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: Allah||extends||the provision||for whom||He wills||of||His slaves||and restricts||for him||Indeed||Allah||of every||thing||(is) All-Knower

translations.text: Allaahu yabsutur rizqa limaien yashaaa'u min ibaadihee Wa-yaqdiru lah; innal laaha bikulli shai'in Aleem

words.id: dan jika||kamu bertanya kepada mereka||siapa||menurunkan||dari||langit||air||lalu menghidupkan||dengannya (air itu)||bumi||dari||sesudah||matinya||tentu mereka akan berkata||Allah||katakan||segala puji||bagi Allah||bahkan/tetapi||kebanyakan mereka||tidak||mereka memahami/berakal
words.en: And if||you ask them||Who||sends down||from||the sky||water||and gives life||thereby||(to) the earth||after||after||its death||Surely, they would say||Allah||Say||All Praises||(are) for Allah||But||most of them||(do) not||use reason

translations.text: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man nazzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-ahyaa bihil arda min ba'di mawtihaa la-yaqoolunnal laah; qulil hamdu lillah; bal aksaruhum laa ya'qiloon

words.id: dan tidaklah||ini||kehidupan||dunia||kecuali||senda gurau||dan main-main||dan sesungguhnya||rumah/kampung||akhirat||sungguh ia||kehidupan||jika||adalah mereka||mereka mengetahui
words.en: And not||(is) this||life||(of) the world||but||amusement||and play||And indeed||the Home||(of) the Hereafter||surely it||(is) the life||if only||they||know

translations.text: Wa-maa haazihil hayaa-tud dunyaaa illaa lahwunw wa-la'ib; Wa-innad Daaral Aakhirata la-hiyal ha-yawaan; law kaanu ya'lamoon

words.id: maka apabila||mereka naik||di dalam/di atas||perahu||mereka berdo'a||Allah||dengan ikhlas||kepada-Nya||ketaatan/agama||maka tatkala||Dia menyelamatkan mereka||sampai||darat||tiba-tiba||mereka||mereka mempersekutukan
words.en: And when||they embark||[in]||the ship||they call||Allah||(being) sincere||to Him||(in) the religion||But when||He delivers them||to||the land||behold||they||associate partners (with Him)

translations.text: Fa-izaa rakiboo fil fulki da'awul laaha mukhliseena lahud deena falammaa najjaa-hum ilal barri izaa hum yushrikoon

words.id: sehingga mereka mengingkari||dengan apa/nikmat||Kami telah berikan kepada mereka||dan sehingga mereka bersenang-senang||maka kelak||mereka mengetahui
words.en: So that they may deny||[in] what||We have given them||and they may enjoy (themselves)||But soon||they will know

translations.text: Li-yakfuroo bimaaa aatainaahum Wa-li-yatamatta'oo fasawfa ya'lamoon

words.id: ataukah tidak||mereka perhatikan||bahwasanya Kami||Kami telah menjadikan||tanah suci||aman||dan rampok-merampok||manusia||dari/di||sekitar mereka||apakah maka dengan yang batil||mereka beriman||dan dengan nikmat||Allah||mereka kafir/ingkar
words.en: Do not||they see||that We||have made||a Sanctuary||secure||while are being taken away||the people||around them||around them||Then do in the falsehood||they believe||and in (the) Favor||(of) Allah||they disbelieve

translations.text: Awalam yaraw annaa ja'alnaa haraman aaminanw Wa-yutakhattafun naasu min haw-lihim; afabil-baatili yu'minoona Wa-bini'matil laahi yakfuroon

words.id: dan siapakah||lebih zalim||dari pada orang||mengada-adakan||atas/terhadap||Allah||kedustaan||atau||dia mendustakan||dengan yang hak||tatkala||ia datang kepadanya||bukankah||dalam||neraka jahanam||tempat tinggal||bagi orang-orang kafir
words.en: And who||(is) more unjust||than (he) who||invents||against||Allah||a lie||or||denies||the truth||when||it has come to him||Is there not||in||Hell||an abode||for the disbelievers

translations.text: Wa-man azlamu mimma nif-taraa 'alal laahi kaziban aw kazzaba bilhaqqi lammaa jaaa'ah; alaisa fee jahannama maswal lil-kaafireen

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||(mereka) berjuang||dalam Kami||sungguh Kami akan menunjukkan mereka||jalan-jalan Kami||dan sesungguhnya||Allah||benar-benar beserta||orang-orang yang berbuat baik
words.en: And those who||strive||for Us||We will surely guide them||(to) Our ways||And indeed||Allah||surely (is) with||the good-doers

translations.text: Wallazeena jaahadoo feenaa lanahdiyannahum subulana; Wa-innal laaha lama'al muhsineen
